Description: Calculates, per course, the sum of the highest score achieved by the user for each learning element in that course, optionally limited to a specified time range.*
Calculates, per course, the maximum possible score, defined as the sum of the defined maximum scores configured for all learning elements belonging to that course.*
Calculates, per course, the total time spent by the user across all attempts of all learning elements in that course, optionally limited to a specified time range.*
Returns the three most recently completed learning elements by the user across all courses, ordered by completion time descending and optionally filtered by a specified time range.*
Calculates, per topic within a given course, the sum of the highest score achieved by the user for each learning element in that topic, optionally limited to a specified time range.*
Calculates, per topic within a given course, the maximum possible score, defined as the sum of the defined maximum scores configured for all learning elements in that topic.*
Calculates, per topic within a given course, the total time spent by the user across all attempts of all learning elements in that topic, optionally limited to a specified time range.*
Returns the three most recently completed learning elements by the user within a specific course, ordered by completion time descending and optionally filtered by a specified time range.*
For each learning element within a specified topic, selects the user’s highest-scoring attempt and returns its score, completion status, and completion timestamp.*
Returns for each learning element within a specified topic its defined maximum achievable score.*
Calculates, for each learning element within a specified topic, the total time spent by the user across all attempts, optionally limited to a specified time range.*
Returns the three most recently completed learning elements by the user within a specified topic, ordered by completion time descending and optionally filtered by a specified time range.*

ID: • Score aggregation MUST consider only the highest-scoring attempt per learning element.
• Time aggregation MUST sum the durations of all attempts.
• All time values MUST be returned in seconds.
• All calculations MUST consider only entities the user is authorized to access.
